rev.diff:
Line 24: Line 24:
PowerDVD 8 supports hardware acceleration of video decoding, which improves performance on relatively low end systems.[http://www.cyberlink.com/multi/products/item_1_2_1_ENU.html] Once installed, the PowerDVD filters can be used by other Windows media player software, such as Windows Media Player, Windows Media Centre and Media Player Classic to enable hardware acceleration in those applications. Vista Media Centre requires a patch to enable this.[http://www.xpmediacentre.com.au/community/downloads.php?do=file&id=119]
PowerDVD 8 supports hardware acceleration of video decoding, which improves performance on relatively low end systems.[http://www.cyberlink.com/multi/products/item_1_2_1_ENU.html] Once installed, the PowerDVD filters can be used by other Windows media player software, such as Windows Media Player, Windows Media Centre and Media Player Classic to enable hardware acceleration in those applications. Vista Media Centre requires a patch to enable this.[http://www.xpmediacentre.com.au/community/downloads.php?do=file&id=119]
  +
== PowerDVD Linux ==
  +
A [[Linux]] version of PowerDVD is available at the [[Canonical Ltd.]] store.<ref>https://shop.canonical.com/product_info.php?products_id=243&osCsid=e827ca15857ef50256d2a218b2cd2d24</ref>
